inclusion.criterion: Aggressive CD20 positive Diffuse Large B-cell lymphoma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: confirmed by Laboratory of Pathology, NCI

inclusion.criterion: NHL previously untreated with cytotoxic chemotherapy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory tests (unless impairment due to respective organ involvement by tumor): Creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dl or creatinine clearance greater than or equal to 50 ml/min
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Bilirubin less than 2.0 mg/dl, or total bilirubin less than or equal to 4.5 mg/dl with direct fraction less than or equal to 0.3 mg/dl in participants for whom these abnormalities are felt to be due to protease inhibitor therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: AST and ALT less than or equal to 3x ULN (AST and ALT less than or equal to 6x ULN for participants on hyperalimentation for whom these abnormalities are felt to be due to the hyperalimentation)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ANC greater than or equal to 1000/mm(3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Platelet greater than or equal to 75,000/mm(3) (unless impairment due to ITP)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability of participant to provide informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current clinical heart failure or symptomatic ischemic heart disease.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: large pericardial effusion, cardiac MRI showed a mass that was 3cm x 1cm on the lateral wall of the right atrium adjacent to the AV junction

exclusion.criterion: Serious underlying medical condition or infection other than HIV that would contraindicate SC-EPOCH-R.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: severe sinus infxn, caused mild non-focal residual deficits

notes: Patient has a large pericardial effusion and a mass on the lateral wall of the right atrium adjacent to the AV junction, which may indicate cardiac involvement. The patient also had a severe sinus infection that caused mild non-focal residual deficits.
